T02D2403:27b-1: aa nutta ra sarba shuddhe kra mam n'a ma /
T02D2403:27b-3: bla med sbyor ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2403:27b-4: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2403:27b-6: de bzhin ma rig mun pa las //
T02D2403:27b-7: gnyis med rig pa skye 'gyur ba'i //
T02D2403:27b-8: rang rig de la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D2403:27b-9: bla med sbyor ba'i rim pa yis //
T02D2403:27b-10: dri med dam chos bshad par bya //
T02D2403:27b-11: stong dang shin tu stong pa ste //
T02D2403:27b-12: stong pa chen po gsum pa yin //
T02D2403:27b-13: bzhi pa rgyu 'bras thams cad do //
T02D2403:27b-14: thabs shes yang dag sbyor ba yis //
T02D2403:27b-15: rdzogs rim yang dag nye bar 'gyur //
T02D2403:27b-16: rdzogs pa nye bar mthong ba yis //
T02D2403:27b-17: thams cad stong pa'i 'od gsal yin //
T02D2403:27b-18: rang rig gsum gyi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2403:27b-19: rgyu gsum rnam par dag par 'gyur //
T02D2403:27b-20: stong nyid don ni rtogs pa yin //
T02D2403:27b-21: bla na med pa'i gnas thob 'gyur //
T02D2403:27b-22: 'od gsal stong pa shes rab dang //
T02D2403:27b-23: sems nyid gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang //
T02D2403:27b-24: de la bdag gis 'di ltar ni //
T02D2403:27b-25: yang dag 'phros pas bshad par bya //
T02D2403:27b-26: rnam par chags shing shin tu chags //
T02D2403:27b-27: chags pa chen po de bzhin no //
T02D2403:27b-28: gti mug la sogs dug gsum gyis //
T02D2403:27b-29: brtan dang g-yo ba'i sems nyid 'di //
T02D2403:28a-0: @28a * // zhi dang chags dang rtogs par ldan //
T02D2403:28a-1: phyi rol ji ltar nang na gnas //
T02D2403:28a-4: srid pa che dang shin tu srid //
T02D2403:28a-5: bkres dang skom pa kun du ldan //
T02D2403:28a-6: tshor ba nyal ba'i tshor ba dang //
T02D2403:28a-7: shin tu tshor ba'i skad cig gcig / so sor rtog dang snying rjer ldan //
T02D2403:28a-8: ngo mtshar ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la //
T02D2403:28a-9: nyams dang phrag dog rnam par bsags //
T02D2403:28a-10: de ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyis //
T02D2403:28a-11: rang rig ye shes rnam par 'gribs //
T02D2403:28a-12: rnal 'byor ba yi nyams len la //
T02D2403:28a-13: nam mkha' bde chen padma'i dbus //
T02D2403:28a-14: zla ba'i gdan la ham yig gnas //
T02D2403:28a-15: kun rdzob gsal zhing dri ma med //
T02D2403:28a-17: zla tshes dmar po shes rab ste //
T02D2403:28a-18: dbyangs yig dang po thig ler ldan //
T02D2403:28a-19: rlung ni 'dzin phyir bsgom par bya //
T02D2403:28a-20: de ni 'od gsal skar chen ltar //
T02D2403:28a-21: sems nyid stong pa'i thabs yin no //
T02D2403:28a-22: gzugs dang bral zhing kha dog med //
T02D2403:28a-23: zhi ba'i rnam pa zung 'jug bral //
T02D2403:28a-24: brtan dang g-yo ba'i tha snyad med //
T02D2403:28a-25: de ltar bla ma'i drin gyis ni //
T02D2403:28a-27: rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2403:28a-28: ci yang mthong 'gyur the tshom med //
T02D2403:28a-29: ji ltar bud shing skam po la //
T02D2403:28a-30: me rgyu gnas kyang 'bar ba med //
T02D2403:28a-31: de bzhin brda dang rtsol med la //
T02D2403:28a-32: byams sems gnas kyang grub pa med //
T02D2403:28a-33: de phyir nga rgyal la sogs spang //
T02D2403:28a-34: brtson 'grus bskyed la bla ma bkur //
T02D2403:28a-35: dbang bskur thob nas nyams len gyis //
T02D2403:28a-36: rnal 'byor dang po'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2403:28a-37: sa ni brgyad po thob par 'gyur //
T02D2403:28a-38: 'od gsal gsum ldan rdzogs pa yis //
T02D2403:28a-39: yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa thob po //
T02D2403:28a-40: dbang bskur thob kyang skur pa 'debs pa dang //
T02D2403:28a-41: brtson 'grus chung la log lta 'dzin pa dang //
T02D2403:28a-42: bla ma'i skyon brjod yon tan brjod mi 'gyur //
T02D2403:28a-43: rgyal ba'i lam ni de yis thob mi 'gyur //
T02D2403:28a-44: bkur sti med cing de nyid thob tu re //
T02D2403:28a-45: tshig ni 'jam ste khro tshul bstan nas 'gro //
T02D2403:28a-46: mi tshogs mang po gnas pa'i sa ru ni //
T02D2403:28a-47: bla ma mthong yang phyag sogs mi byed de //
T02D2403:28a-48: snod dang mi ldan gdams ngag mi spyin no //
T02D2403:28a-49: yon tan bzang thob brtson 'grus ldan pa ni //
T02D2403:28b-0: @28b bla ma 'khor sogs bkur sti ldan pa la //
T02D2403:28b-1: sangs rgyas rnams dang mnyam pa'i dga' ba 'dzin //
T02D2403:28b-2: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos la sred pa che //
T02D2403:28b-3: rgyud rten rgyud mang rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
T02D2403:28b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i lam du 'gyur ba de //
T02D2403:28b-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba gang thob rgyur 'gyur ba //
T02D2403:28b-6: 'gro ba drug la bsngo zhing bkra shis shog /
T02D2403:28b-7: bla med sbyor ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba slob
